generated_body: If you click on the article titled "This was uglier than a brawl. And Myles Garrett deserves suspension for rest of year after helmet attack," you can expect a detailed account of the incident involving Myles Garrett and the ensuing controversy. The article will likely discuss the specifics of the helmet attack during the game, including any penalties imposed and reactions from coaches, players, and analysts.
